ComicInfo.Title: The Trojan Elephant; Kimbara Outback
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hey Kids, it’s Animal Jam! The world’s largest online playground for kids where they can learn about the natural world is now a new and exciting comic! Join in on the fun for all new adventures with all of your favorite characters!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Fernando Ruiz & Peter Pantazis | 1 | B | Cover B | Tony Fleecs | 2 | C | Gameplay Cover C | Gameplay | 3 | D | Coloring Book Cover D | Tony Fleecs | 4 | E/RI | Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Cover | Fernando Ruiz | 5 | F/RI | Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Tony Fleecs | Missing | G/Auth | Blank Authentix Cover | None | 6 |
